experience: You and Romildo both know John Danner, Tom Salvatierra, CFP®, and 1 other
Romildo can introduce you to 10 people at Google

At Barefoot, we believe that the network should be blazing fast and fully programmable. We envision a world where programmable networks outperform fixed-function networks. We believe that programming the network should be as easy to program as a server. And we have invented technology to achieve all of these goals
Taking new responsibilities at our fast growing business at Personal Capital. Focusing on helping the Sysop and IT groups keep up with the fast pace technology changes and automation.

Responsible for building and managing production Cloud infrastructure at AWS and internal IT spread out in 3 physical locations across the US. Currently managing a team of 10 people that is responsible for all aspects of our production infrastructure and supports internal IT. We started the business at zero and now over 1 million people use Personal Capital to track over $245 billion with $2.6 billion assets under management.Personal Capital built the next generation financial advisor--a financial institution designed around and customized for individuals.  Our founding team is comprised of some of the nation’s leading financial technology and e-finance executives, backed by a leading Silicon Valley venture capital firm.Extensive experience in Cloud, networking and Applications.

(Ziosoft is an innovator in 3D advanced visualization software for the medical diagnostics field)Responsible for managing the global infrastructure in the US and various offices in Japan with a team of 4 Systems Administrators. I manage all aspects of the network infrastructure, budgeting, and the recommendation and implementation of new technologies. Some of the technologies I am responsible for include (but are not limited to): WAN circuits, Layer 3 switches, Firewalls, routers, VPN, VoIP, and Video conferencing; mail systems including Unix gateway running sendmail, spamassassin, clamd virus scan, and Exchange 2007 as the corporate mail system; storage, backups, intranet, QA TestTrack, SVN, VMWare ESX virtualization (using HP fiber switches and HP SAN and Servers), Shoretel VoIP phone system, Backbone and Commvault Backup system, Unix and Windows deployment systems (kickstart and WDS). I work closely with Development and QA to provide the adequate tools and infrastructure necessary for a tight development schedule.

recommendations: Ratnakar Verma
Vice President Of Engineering at FusionSeven, Inc.
January 7, 2016, Ratnakar worked with Romildo in different groups

I had the opportunity to work with Romildo at Personal Capital since startup days.We urgently needed someone who is expert in getting systems up and running quickly that horizontally scales through right orchestration mechanism. Romildo came to rescue. He turned out to be a guru in everything we needed. His deep knowledge of production systems of various technologies made him a go-to-person for any cloud/infrastructure related architecture.One of the great qualities of Romildo is that he never settles for less. He finds the best solution for complex sysop requirements. He is highly skilled in VMware and certified in Amazon's AWS cloud. I have seen him setting up his team from ground up and bringing order to entire DevOps arena. He is also immensely talented in settings up data center and stuff. Romildo has successfully setup IT groups at multiple geographic locations to fulfill the needs of round-the-clock support. Romildo has extensive background in various monitoring tools such as Nagios and also knows how to integrate with third party systems such as PagerDuty, OneLogin, RightScale, WhiteHat Security.Despite being in senior level management role, Romildo never hesitates to be a hands-on person. His scripting skills are of of top-notch. He knows ins and outs of every Linux distros. Continuous integration and deployment has been one of his passion.

Firstly, Romi has an amazing work ethic.  He does whatever is necessary to get the job done...even if that requires extreme work sessions and late hours to do so.  Secondly, his work product and solutions are exemplary, as he rarely takes shortcuts.  You can expect long-term IT solutions from Romi's team and he's never afraid to roll up his sleeves to work alongside them.  I'll add that he negotiates with vendors extremely well and frequently surprised me with the discounts he achieved from them.   I'd highly recommend Romi to run any IT operation where scalability is a priority and long-term high quality solutions are valued.  Lastly, I'm happy to speak with anyone directly who is considering him for such a leadership position.

summary: Known for the ability to meet challenges, develop strategies, overcome obstacles to implement processes and integrate technologies involved with complex application migrations in production environments without disruption.  Expertly skilled in hardware and software applications and resource management with a demonstrated effectiveness in the management of sophisticated environments.  Established reputation for analyzing situations rapidly with astute eye based on experience along with the attention to detail and imagination necessary to formulate practical action plans necessary to solve complex issues under pressure.Specialties: AWS, Virtualization,  Unix, Windows, Networking, Storage, Netapp, Cisco, IT planing and budgeting, SQL Database, Mysql, Exchange 2003, Exchange 2007, FTP, SSH, Sharepoint, Citrix, Domain Controlers 2003 and 2008, DNS, DHCP, WINS, RMS, Commvault, DataDomain, F5 Load Balancers, VMWare, Virtual Center, VMWare Server, VMware Workstation, VMWare Virtual Lab, L2 Wan, Cisco VPN Tunnel, Cisco Client VPN, EIRGP, BGP, MAC X, Acronis, WDS, WSUS, DFS, Apache, IIS, Cisco VoIP, Sales Force, Perl
